      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Block DeclProcFunc.block
      Block for the procedure/function body
      Block Program.block
      Block containing the top-level statements of the Program

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ASTNullVisitor.visitBlock(Block b) 
      void ASTPrintVisitor.visitBlock(Block b)
      Prints a Block: Decls, (offset), Stmts
      void ASTVisitor.visitBlock(Block b) 
      Constructors in MPC with parameters of type Block 
      Constructor and Description
      DeclProcFunc(TypeProcFunc type, Block block, int left, int right)
      Creates a new DeclProcFunc instance given its signature (TypeProcFunc, which includes its name), body (a Block), and start/end source code position
      Program(Decls dd, Block blk, int left, int right)
      Creates a new Program instance given the top-level Decls, Block, and source (start/end) position
